It was simple: one moment, you were playing Pokémon: Yellow Version in your bedroom; the next, you were in a forest. Well, sort of. The oddest thing was how the "trees" looked entirely green and almost flat... You carefully walked forward, 'less you had been kidnapped by a psycho...

You gasped. As you exited the forest after a good forever, you realized that it was a forest...a forest of grass. You stumbled backwards from the green towers and took in your surroundings. Trees like skyscrapers were scattered around. Everything you could see had been expanded. However, thinking it over, you realize that maybe, jus maybe, you had actually been shrunk somehow. Then, thinking about it better, it could just be a dream. As you backed up, you suddenly bumped into something. Something soft. Something bouncy. Something...furry?

Turning around immediately, your vision was engulfed by that of a massive, yellow butt. You blushed. "Hm?" a voice boomed. You looked up and gasped once more to see it was an enormous Pikachu. "Ah, there you are!" he laughed. Before you could respond or even think over 'there you are', you are snatched and lifted up in his massive paw. "Before you ask, I shrunk you. I won't go into how, so don't bother asking. I've brought you here to be my little pet. Or slave, if that's your thing. And I know for a fact you don't really mind being either, so don't deny it!"

"Uhhh..." you paused. "This has to be a dream..."
